org.vaadin.addons.lazyquerycontainer

Interface Query

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBeanQuery, EntityQuery

    public interface Query
    Interface for loading data in batches and saving modifications.
    Author:
    Tommi S.E. Laukkanen

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.vaadin.data.Item constructItem()
      Constructs new item to be used when adding items.
      boolean deleteAllItems()
      Removes all items.
      List<com.vaadin.data.Item> loadItems(int startIndex, int count)
      Load batch of items.
      void saveItems(List<com.vaadin.data.Item> addedItems, List<com.vaadin.data.Item> modifiedItems, List<com.vaadin.data.Item> removedItems)
      Saves the modifications done by container to the query result.
      int size()
      Gets number of items available through this query.

    • Method Detail

      • size

        int size()
        Gets number of items available through this query.
        Returns:
        Number of items.

      • loadItems

        List<com.vaadin.data.Item> loadItems(int startIndex,
                                   int count)
        Load batch of items.
        Parameters:
        startIndex - Starting index of the item list.
        count - Count of the items to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        List of items.

      • saveItems

        void saveItems(List<com.vaadin.data.Item> addedItems,
             List<com.vaadin.data.Item> modifiedItems,
             List<com.vaadin.data.Item> removedItems)
        Saves the modifications done by container to the query result. Query will be discarded after changes have been saved and new query loaded so that changed items are sorted appropriately.
        Parameters:
        addedItems - Items to be inserted.
        modifiedItems - Items to be updated.
        removedItems - Items to be deleted.

      • deleteAllItems

        boolean deleteAllItems()
        Removes all items. Query will be discarded after delete all items has been called.
        Returns:
        true if the operation succeeded or false in case of a failure.

      • constructItem

        com.vaadin.data.Item constructItem()
        Constructs new item to be used when adding items.
        Returns:
        The new item.
